org.jppf.client.taskwrapper

Interface DataProviderHolder


  • public interface DataProviderHolder
    This interface must be implemented by tasks that are not implementations of Task when they need access to the job's DataProvider.

    Implementations should ensure the DataProvider is not kept as a persistent (on-transient) attribute of the implementing class, otherwise it will be serialized along with the task after execution, causing additional CPU usage and network traffic.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setDataProvider(DataProvider dataProvider)
      Set the data provider for the task.

    • Method Detail

      • setDataProvider

        void setDataProvider(DataProvider dataProvider)
        Set the data provider for the task.
        Parameters:
        dataProvider - the data provider set onto the job to which the tasks belongs.
